ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank the reviewers for helpful feedback on the analyses.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: DMW is supported by grants R56AI110449 and R01AI110449 from NIH/NIAID, P30AG021342 NIH/NIA, UL1TR001863 (NIH/NCATS), and OPP1114733 (The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation). JLW is supported by KL2TR001862 (NIH/NCATS) The funders had no role in the design, or the collection, analysis, or interpretation of the data.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The SAS code used to model the ZIP-code level RSV data are included as Additional file 1. The hospitalization data were obtained by request through the Connecticut Department of Public Health but cannot be shared directly by the authors due to data privacy agreements.

sec.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
sec.p: DBN performed all analyses and wrote the first draft of the manuscript. JLW contributed to the development of the statistical models. VEP conceived of the study and analyses. DMW conceived of the study and drafted the manuscript. All authors contributed to the revision of the manuscript and approve of the final manuscript.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interest.

sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: The study was approved by the Human Investigation Committees at Yale University and the CT-DPH. Certain data used in this publication were obtained from the CT-DPH. The authors assume full responsibility for analyses and interpretation of these data.
